document_data.name: Kiros Iskin
document_data.mainbody: '''Kiros Iskin''' was an inhabitant of [[Almorel]] in the [[Hordelands]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Kiros served an important role as the lighthouse keeper of the [[Lantern-house]], guiding smalls boats through the heavy fog of the [[Lake of Mists]] to the docks of the city.
